channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Lime bike abandoned in Rochester Terrace Gardens, 20th June
item.description:
Obstructing he footpath in a pedestrianised gardens.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 19C, Rochester Road, Kentish Town, London

item.title: Speed bump needs additional markings, 20th June
item.description:
The speed bump that has been installed on the road surface at this location needs to have white arrows painted onto the road at the point where the bump ends. Currently there is no marking to indicate where the bump ends in a downaward slope.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 97, Wardour Street, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Trees are blocking g pavement, 20th June
item.description:
Trees and low branches are blocking pavement and access to the pavement. No room for push chair and safety issue as I keep hitting my head on the branches trying h to get past safely

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Basing Drive, Bexley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Endless rubbish, 20th June
item.description:
Everyday there’s more and more rubbish left, bin bags ripped open by foxes, used nappies and food waste spilling onto the pavement. I’m not sure why Bromley council tolerate the filth or expect us to.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mackenzie Road, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Car has not been moved for 6 weeks a, 20th June
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 19, Lingey Close, Longlands, Sidcup, London

item.title: Collapsed manhole on the juntion of orchard road & main road it is dangerous, 20th June
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Orchard Road, Longlands, London
